title: Phase 2: Expand Color System from 9 to 17 Colors

overview.goal: Extend existing 9-color system to 17 colors for richer UI design without breaking changes
overview.approach: Additive only - keep all existing colors, add 8 new color fields (hardcoded values)
overview.backward_compatibility: 100% - all existing components continue to work

must_not: Require changes to existing components to keep working

1_elevatedSurface.purpose: Layered UI elements with depth (modals, popovers, elevated cards)
1_elevatedSurface.usage: Modal backgrounds, dropdown menus, cards on cards
1_elevatedSurface.relationship: Light mode: lighter than surface. Dark mode: lighter/more saturated than surface

2_overlay.purpose: Semi-transparent overlays for modals and dialogs
2_overlay.usage: Modal backdrop, lightbox scrim, loading overlays

3_hover.purpose: Interactive hover states for buttons and list items
3_hover.usage: Button hover, list item hover, card hover
3_hover.relationship: Slightly lighter/darker than background or surface

4_pressed.purpose: Active/pressed button states (more pronounced than hover)
4_pressed.usage: Button active state, pressed list items, toggle buttons
4_pressed.relationship: More pronounced than hover for clear tactile feedback

5_disabled.relationship: Reduced contrast to indicate non-interactive state

6_highlight.purpose: Selected text, search results, notifications, badges
6_highlight.usage: Text selection, search highlight, notification dots, 'New' indicators

7_linkColor.purpose: Hyperlinks (can be same as or distinct from tint)
7_linkColor.usage: Clickable links in text, navigation links, inline content links
7_linkColor.relationship: Often same as tint, but can differ (e.g., blue for links, gray tint)

8_accentSecondary.purpose: Secondary accent for variety without overwhelming
8_accentSecondary.usage: Secondary buttons, alternative badges, supporting graphics
8_accentSecondary.relationship: Harmonizes with tint, less saturated or different hue

step_9_update_changelog.content:
- **17-Color Theme System** (Phase 2 of Theme Expansion)
  - Expanded from 9 to 17 colors per theme for richer UI design
  - Added elevatedSurface for layered UI elements (modals, popovers)
  - Added overlay for semi-transparent modal backdrops
  - Added hover and pressed states for interactive elements
  - Added disabled state for non-interactive elements
  - Added highlight color for selections and notifications
  - Added linkColor for hyperlinks (distinct from buttons)
  - Added accentSecondary for visual variety
  - All 5 themes updated with full 17-color palettes
  - Backward compatible: existing components work unchanged

step_10_git_commit.commit_message:
Expand theme system to 17-color palette (Phase 2)

Expanded ColorScheme from 9 to 17 fields for richer UI design:

New Colors Added (8):
- elevatedSurface: Layered UI elements (modals, popovers)
- overlay: Semi-transparent modal backdrops
- hover: Interactive hover states
- pressed: Active/pressed button states
- disabled: Disabled UI elements
- highlight: Selections, search results, notifications
- linkColor: Hyperlinks (can differ from tint)
- accentSecondary: Secondary accent for variety

All 5 Themes Updated:
- greyscale: Professional monochrome with blue links
- appleNotes: Apple-inspired with system blue accents
- sepia: Warm earth tones throughout
- nord: Arctic blues with frost accents
- bearRedGraphite: Bold red with coral secondary

Technical:
- 100% backward compatible (all existing colors preserved)
- All colors manually selected for theme harmony
- All themes designed to meet WCAG AA contrast standards

Phase 2 of 3-phase theme expansion
